title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
description: The bug report is about the group dialog not being accessible when the dataset is not set in a table report item. The expected behavior is that users should still be able to define a group even if the dataset is not defined.
OB: When a table report item is added without setting a dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, they are unable to access the group dialog.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting a dataset, users should still be able to access the group dialog and define a group.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting a dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Observe that the group dialog is not accessible.
